## Keyword type

Represents the data of a Keyword used to classify items.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Keyword = RepositoryLocalObject & {
    Description?: string;
    IsAbstract?: boolean;
    IsRoot?: boolean;
    Key?: string;
    ParentKeywords?: Array<Link>;
    RelatedKeywords?: Array<Link>;
};
```
